original_title: ことわざ辞典 へたな鉄砲も数うちゃあたる！
overview: Amateur animation by 20-year-old Hikeaki Anno while he was studying at Osaka University of Arts. The short is an animated form of the idiom "even a poor marksman will hit the target with enough shots".
title: Proverb Dictionary: He Who Shoots Often, Hits at Last!
